data.author: King Pi

changelog.release_notes:
Respect watch's quiet time
Setting page can now be initialized correctly
Add back accidentally removed menu icon

-Black&White devices can choose either black or white color for text and background now
-fix the wrong positioning in Pebble Round
Black&White devices can choose either black or white color for text and background now

Support SDK4! Time and Date will display at top when Quick View appears so you won't miss any important information:)

Dropbox no longer displays configuration page so change host to Github. Sorry for inconvenience caused.

*Since I don't own Pebble round and Pebble 2, I can only test the watchface on emulator. Please feel free to contact me if you found any problem or have question about it. Thank you:)

Fix unable to save configuration problem in Pebble OG
Fix mouth position in Pebble OG due to bug of emulator

Add options:
-Hourly vibration
-Show phone battery level if phone browser supports(it seems only android supports in the meantime)

In last release, Pebble OG can't show the mouth animation due to CloudPebble's bug with Pebble team's confirmation. It seems it is fixed now.

Also found that they fixed another bug in SDK so it broke my workaround for configuration page. It caused configuration page not workable. It is fixed in this release too.

Fixed a bug in bluetooth status checking.

- Support Pebble Time Round
- Improve battery performance

Update to SDK 3 finally!

Through configuration page, user can
- set background color
- set text color
- enable to show date
- enable to show bluetooth connection icon
- enable to show battery level and icon
- enable to vibrate when bluetooth connection lost

Will be able to choose different kinds of cats in future release:)

data.description:
Cute maneki neko(lucky cat) on your watch and bring good luck to you:)
Beckoning and move mouth every minute.

Through configuration page, user can
- set background color
- set text color
- enable to show date
- enable to show bluetooth connection icon
- enable to show battery level and icon
- enable to vibrate when bluetooth connection lost
- enable hourly vibration (turn off by default)
- enable to show phone battery level if phone browser supports(it seems only android supports in the meantime)

latest_release.release_notes:
Respect watch's quiet time
Setting page can now be initialized correctly
Add back accidentally removed menu icon

data.title: Maneki Neko Watch
